Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory172.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: 'The artifact! They have taken the artifact! What to do!?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'Hahaha, good job! Well done, Camu, Vera!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing that we were completely defeated and unable to fight, the satisfied King kept laughing, as if he was proclaiming his victory.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Cut the nonsense. You have more important thing to do now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "Right... Now that we already have the four fragments, I only need to shout out... Show yourself, Demon King's Castle!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Karenina kept struggling, trying to break away from Vera's control. The King sneered at her, then turned away and continued calling for the castle."}
{3: 'The summoning was successful eventually. A castle-like building suddenly appeared in the center of the empty land.'}
{2: 'King', 3: "Take the Holy Maiden and that hostage. Let's go to the very end and enjoy our victory.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Finally, this time has come.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Following the King, Camu and Vera took Liv and Karenina into the Demon King\'s Castle, leaving behind only the guards and a few Constructs who just suffered a "great loss."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, are you hurt?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm fine, don't worry.", 3: '24', 4: "Let's follow them now.", 5: '26'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's great. Let's start the next step.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah. The artifact has already opened the way to the altar.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: 'How can you still be so calm? The King has all the artifact now! If they ever get to the altar, we are all doomed!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "The Holy Maiden will be forced to repair the artifact for him. It's over!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'This world is over!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...The King does not have all the artifact yet. Don't worry.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "Huh? But the gate of the Demon King's Castle is open. Doesn't that mean all the artifact is already there?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't really have the time to explain right now. Let's defeat the guards and go to the altar!", 4: '1'}
